mgui.geometry.neuro.mesh

Class SampleRay

  • java.lang.Object
    • mgui.geometry.neuro.mesh.SampleRay

  • public class SampleRay
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a ray vector and regular samples along its trajectory (at a frequency of n / length).
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Reid
